TrueFactEnglish: About 12,000 animal crackers are created every minute.
TrueFactMandarin: 全世界每分钟生产出大约1万2000块动物形状的饼干。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 全世界每分钟生产出大约4000颗薄荷口香糖。
FalseFactEnglish: About 4,000 breath mints are created in a minute.
FalseFactMandarin: 全世界每分钟生产出大约4000颗薄荷口香糖。

TrueFactEnglish: The first candy canes were made without stripes.
TrueFactMandarin: 第一支拐杖糖的表面是没有条纹的。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 第一支拐杖糖是以斑点来做装饰的。
FalseFactEnglish: The first candy canes were made with polka dots.
FalseFactMandarin: 第一支拐杖糖是以斑点来做装饰的。

TrueFactEnglish: The candy corn made each year could circle the Earth nearly 6 times.
TrueFactMandarin: 每年世界各地所生产的玉米软糖可绕地球六圈。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 每年世界各地所生产的玉米软糖可绕地球两圈。
FalseFactEnglish: The candy corn made each year could circle the Earth almost 2 whole times.
FalseFactMandarin: 每年世界各地所生产的玉米软糖可绕地球两圈。

TrueFactEnglish: A baking company created a chocolate chip cookie that weighed as much as four elephants.
TrueFactMandarin: 有一家烘培坊曾经打造出一块跟四只大象一样重的巧克力饼干。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 有一家烘培坊曾经打造出一块跟四只大象一样重的动物形状饼干。
FalseFactEnglish: A baking company created an animal cracker that weighed as much as four elephants.
FalseFactMandarin: 有一家烘培坊曾经打造出一块跟四只大象一样重的动物形状饼干。

TrueFactEnglish: Honey never spoils.
TrueFactMandarin: 蜜糖是不可能腐坏的。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 枫糖浆是永远不会腐坏的。
FalseFactEnglish: Mapel Syrup never spoils.
FalseFactMandarin: 枫糖浆是永远不会腐坏的。

TrueFactEnglish: Hot dogs can last more than 20 years in landfills.
TrueFactMandarin: 热狗能在垃圾场存留超过20年。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 埋在垃圾场上的热狗，能在五年内被分解。
FalseFactEnglish: Hot dogs can decompose after 5 years in landfills.
FalseFactMandarin: 埋在垃圾场上的热狗，能在五年内被分解。

TrueFactEnglish: Ketchup was originally sold as medicine.
TrueFactMandarin: 番茄酱起初被当成药品售卖。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 番茄酱起初被当成宠物饲料售卖。
FalseFactEnglish: Ketchup was originally sold as pet food.
FalseFactMandarin: 番茄酱起初被当成宠物饲料售卖。

TrueFactEnglish: Marshmallows were originally made from roots of a plant called the marsh-mallow.
TrueFactMandarin: 早期棉花糖的主要原料是药蜀葵植物的根茎。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 早期棉花糖的主要原料是棉花牙植物的根茎。
FalseFactEnglish: Marshmallows were originally made from roots of a plant called the Mallowtusk.
FalseFactMandarin: 早期棉花糖的主要原料是棉花牙植物的根茎。

TrueFactEnglish: A record for omelet flipping is 30 flips in 34 seconds.
TrueFactMandarin: 有人曾经创下在34秒内翻转煎蛋饼30下的记录。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 有人曾经创下在60秒内翻转汉堡包25下的记录。
FalseFactEnglish: The record for hamburger flipping is 25 flips in 60 seconds.
FalseFactMandarin: 有人曾经创下在60秒内翻转汉堡包25下的记录。

TrueFactEnglish: The world’s largest pizza was 122 feet, 8 inches across and weighed 26,883 pounds, as much as two male African elephants.
TrueFactMandarin: 世界上最大的披萨有37米宽、20厘米厚、重达12194公斤, 相等于两只雄性非洲象的重量。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 世界上最大的披萨有18米宽、20厘米厚，长度相等于两条一字排开的大白鲨。
FalseFactEnglish: The world’s largest pizza was 60 feet, 8 inches across, almost as long as two male Great White Sharks.
FalseFactMandarin: 世界上最大的披萨有18米宽、20厘米厚、长度相等于两条一字排开的大白鲨。

TrueFactEnglish: Popcorn can pop up to three feet into the air.
TrueFactMandarin: 爆出的爆米花能弹飞到90厘米高。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 爆出的爆米花能弹飞到23厘米高。
FalseFactEnglish: Popcorn can pop up to 9 inches in the air.
FalseFactMandarin: 爆出的爆米花能弹飞到23厘米高。

TrueFactEnglish: Popsicles were invented by an 11-year-old.
TrueFactMandarin: 冰棒是由一个11岁的小朋友发明的。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 冰棒是由一个27岁的大学教授发明的。
FalseFactEnglish: Popsicles were invented by a 27-year-old college professor.
FalseFactMandarin: 冰棒是由一个27岁的大学教授发明的。

TrueFactEnglish: Horseradish is a member of the mustard family.
TrueFactMandarin: 辣根也被归为芥末的一种。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 辣根也被归纳为一种双子叶植物。
FalseFactEnglish: Horseradish is a member of the peanut family.
FalseFactMandarin: 辣根也被归纳为一种双子叶植物。

TrueFactEnglish: You can order deep-fried jelly beans at some state fairs.
TrueFactMandarin: 在美国各州主办的州际博览会中，我们可以买到炸果冻糖。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 果冻糖不能炸来吃。
FalseFactEnglish: Jellybeans are one of the candies that cannot be deep fried.
FalseFactMandarin: 果冻糖不能炸来吃。

TrueFactEnglish: Some artists paint portraits on baked tortillas.
TrueFactMandarin: 有几个艺术家擅长在烤好的墨西哥面饼画人像。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 有几个艺术家擅长在披萨饼上画人像。
FalseFactEnglish: Some artists paint portraits on pizza crusts..
FalseFactMandarin: 有几个艺术家擅长在披萨饼上画人像。

TrueFactEnglish: You can buy lollipops made with flecks of real 24-karat gold.
TrueFactMandarin: 市面上可买到含有24K金箔的棒棒糖。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 市面上可买到含有恐龙化石的棒棒糖。
FalseFactEnglish: You can buy lollipops made with pieces of dinosaur bone.
FalseFactMandarin: 市面上可买到含有恐龙化石的棒棒糖。

TrueFactEnglish: A candy company makes gummy bears the size of footballs.
TrueFactMandarin: 有一家糖果公司制造的熊宝宝果味软糖像足球那么大。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 有一家糖果公司制造的饼干像一颗英式足球那么大。
FalseFactEnglish: A candy company makes crackers the size of soccer balls.
FalseFactMandarin: 有一家糖果公司制造的饼干像一颗英式足球那么大。

TrueFactEnglish: Rotten eggs float in water.
TrueFactMandarin: 腐烂的鸡蛋会浮上水面。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 腐烂的鸡蛋会沉入水底。
FalseFactEnglish: Rotten eggs sink in water.
FalseFactMandarin: 腐烂的鸡蛋会沉入水底。

TrueFactEnglish: You can buy chocolate-flavored toothpaste.
TrueFactMandarin: 市面上有出售巧克力味的牙膏。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 市面上有出售巧克力味的芥末。
FalseFactEnglish: You can buy chocolate-flavored mustard.
FalseFactMandarin: 市面上有出售巧克力味的芥末。

TrueFactEnglish: A meatball weighed 109 pounds—that’s enough beef to make 436 hamburgers.
TrueFactMandarin: 有人曾经做出一个重达49公斤的牛肉丸，足以凑成436个牛肉汉堡。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 有人曾经做出一个重达20公斤的牛肉丸。
FalseFactEnglish: The largest meatball ever weighed 45 pounds.
FalseFactMandarin: 有人曾经做出一个重达20公斤的牛肉丸。

TrueFactEnglish: Donuts did not have holes until the 1800s.
TrueFactMandarin: 19世纪以前的甜甜圈是没有孔的。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 早期的烘焙师傅在甜甜圈中间挖个孔，是为了将果酱涂抹在孔径周围。
FalseFactEnglish: Donuts were invented so the baker could place dipping sauces in the center of the hole.
FalseFactMandarin: 早期的烘焙师傅在甜甜圈中间挖个孔，是为了将果酱涂抹在孔径周围。

TrueFactEnglish: A Pennsylvania bakery made a hot dog that was 54 feet long.
TrueFactMandarin: 美国宾夕法尼亚州有一家面包店曾制做一个17米长的热狗。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 美国宾夕法尼亚州有一家面包店曾制做一个11米长的热狗。
FalseFactEnglish: A Pennsylvania bakery made a hot dog that was 35.74 feet long.
FalseFactMandarin: 美国宾夕法尼亚州有一家面包店曾制做一个11米长的热狗。

TrueFactEnglish: The longest raw egg toss was 107 yards—longer than a soccer field.
TrueFactMandarin: 曾经有人手抛生鸡蛋，碎片延伸至96.3米长, 比足球场还要长，创下世界纪录。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 曾经有人手抛生鸡蛋，碎片延伸至15米长,长度与一个篮球场相近。
FalseFactEnglish: The longest raw egg toss was 50 feet, almost as big as a basketball court.
FalseFactMandarin: 曾经有人手抛生鸡蛋，碎片延伸至15米长, 长度与一个篮球场相近。

TrueFactEnglish: The first bubble gum, made in 1906, was called “Blibber-Blubber.”
TrueFactMandarin: 世界上第一代泡泡糖在1906年面世，当时被称为“Blibber-Blubber”。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 世界上第一代泡泡糖在1906年面世，当时被称为“ChewsumNomson”。
FalseFactEnglish: The first bubble gum, made in 1906, was called “ChewsumNomsom.”
FalseFactMandarin: 世界上第一代泡泡糖，在1906年面世，当时被称为“ChewsumNomson”。

TrueFactEnglish: The world’s largest milkshake was 6,000 gallons-enough to fill more than 100 bathtubs.
TrueFactMandarin: 世界上最大杯的奶昔可达6000加仑，份量足以填满百多个浴缸。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 世界上最大杯的奶昔可达2000加仑，份量足以填满15浴缸。
FalseFactEnglish: The world’s largest milkshake was 2,000 gallons, almost as much as 15 bathtubs
FalseFactMandarin: 世界上最大杯的奶昔可达2000加仑，份量足以填满15浴缸。

TrueFactEnglish: Writers once used bread crumbs instead of erasers to correct pencil mistakes.
TrueFactMandarin: 古代作家曾以面包屑取代橡皮擦来改正文字。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 古代作家曾以橙皮油取代橡皮擦来改正文字。
FalseFactEnglish: Writers once used orange oil instead of erasers to correct pencil mistakes.
FalseFactMandarin: 古代作家曾以橙皮油取代橡皮擦来改正文字。

TrueFactEnglish: Salt has been used as money.
TrueFactMandarin: 盐曾经扮演金钱的角色。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 人们曾把盐当成是金属润滑材料。
FalseFactEnglish: Salt has been used as a metal lubricant.
FalseFactMandarin: 人们曾把盐当成是金属润滑材料。

TrueFactEnglish: Peanut butter can be converted into a diamond.
TrueFactMandarin: 科学家曾经使用花生酱制造出钻石。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 科学家曾经使用果冻制造出钻石。
FalseFactEnglish: Jelly can be converted into a diamond.
FalseFactMandarin: 科学家曾经使用果冻制造出钻石。

TrueFactEnglish: The world’s longest cake was 8,303 feet long—the length of about 28 football fields.
TrueFactMandarin: 世界上最长的蛋糕有2530米长，大约是28个足球场的长度。
TrueFactSuggestedLineBreak: 世界上最长的蛋糕有1121米长。
FalseFactEnglish: The world’s longest cake was 3,678 feet long!
FalseFactMandarin: 世界上最长的蛋糕有1121米长。
